abstract: Makeup company Fashion Fair, once one of the few cosmetics options for women of color, is revamping its image after increasing competition from major brands; has appointed veteran makeup artist Sam Fine as creative director and is expanding their promotional events to attract a younger generation.
snippet: Once one of the few makeup options for women of color, Fashion Fair is finding increased competition from major brands and revamping its image.
lead_paragraph: Once one of the few makeup options for women of color, Fashion Fair is finding increased competition from major brands and revamping its image.
